abstract: Take a historical tour of Caramut as told by the locals. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Moyne'.
description: Three locals talk about personal histories in the small town of Caramut in regional Victoria. Take a trip down memory lane with Patricia Giles as she talks about soldier settlement and how the town has changed over the years. Tom and Dan Dickson look back on their family history and give us a tour of the town, including a stone bridge their great grandfather built that still stands in Caramut today.
